document_data.name: Pellanonia Auvryndar
document_data.mainbody: '''Pellanonia Auvryndar''' was a [[drow]] member of [[House Auvryndar]] in the drow settlement in the [[Sargauth Level]] in [[Undermountain]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Pellanonia was a priestess of [[Lolth]] and a daughter of Matron Mother [[Vlonwelv Auvryndar]].

In [[1492 DR]],{{Waterdeep-time}} Pellanonia was engaged in a consensual act of torture together with her lover [[Ghirith Nhilran]].
document_data.Personality: Pellanonia was very proud of her heritage and to save her life could divulge precious information to her assailants.
document_data.Relationship: Pellanonia was in love with her fellow female Ghirith.
document_data.Activities: Pellanonia and Ghirith liked to use their free time torturing each other.
